title: IMAGE overview page
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see a list of all IMAGES\
So I can get a general idea of the different types that exist\
And by scrolling through them find interesting ones
description:
* There is a dedicated page (with a dedicated URL) where all IMAGES are presented.
* A warning message is shown when there are no IMAGES.
* The overview page always returns with status code \`200\`, no matter if any IMAGE exists or not.
* By default, the IMAGES are sorted \`ascending\` by their \`name\`.
* The sorting is always case-insensitive.
* Each IMAGE is presented with its primary information and a link to its detail page.
* The overview displays at most 100 IMAGES at once.
* When there are more than 100 IMAGES then the “pagination” feature is activated.
* Pagination allows the user to scroll through all IMAGES - 100 items at a time.
* The user is able to bookmark and revisit any paginated IMAGE page.
